# HVAC Heat Recovery

## Description
Adds a heat recovery system to all air loops.  Does not replace or update efficiencies for exisitng heat recovery systems.

## Modeler Description
Adds a heat recovery system to all air loops.  Does not replace or update efficiencies for exisitng heat recovery systems.

## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Arguments




This measure does not have any user arguments
